name: Escape to the Sky
description:
Summary: 

The earth is in chaos and you must escape to the floating island as it is the only safe place left that you can reach!

Notes: 

- This game was made for the Weekly Game Jam (Week 110)

- This is my second game!

-  Any feedback or suggestions would be greatly appreciated.

- The Watch Ad Button simply supports me and if you would watch an ad it would be greatly appreciated!

- This game is for Android!
